column4: ok, clean ubuntu 11.04 install, double checked that LAMPs is installed, yet I cannot connect to phpmyadmin, suggestions? thanks
11.04 x64 server install that is
Apache running?
is php up and running properly?
I think so, not sure how to test that
cd to your root folder of your website and do echo "<?php phpinfo(); ?>" > test.php
Then navigate to localhost/test.php
yeah, that seems to be working
Ok, so while still in the root directory of the website, do you see a phpmyadmin/ directory?
negative ghost rider...
Then it sounds like you need to install phpmyadmin
NM, you may have installed it from the repository
In which case it wouldn't actually be there.
negative ghost rider...
go to /etc/apache2/conf.d/ and look for a symlink
I see charset  javascript-common.conf  localized-error-pages  other-vhosts-access-log  security, so i'm guessing the phpmyadmin installed messed up?
Looks like
Still there?
: yeah, googled for what to symlink, thanks :)
So it's all working now?
yeah, works fine once I link it, thanks
